unnormalised: Organic farming, eh? My naniji in Kerala always said it's the only way! No chemicals, just good old cow dung like they've been doing for centuries. Remember that workshop at IARI, Delhi in 2010? Mind-blowing! We need more farmers like Ramesh bhai from my village, growing organic mangoes. Makes a difference, right? Saw some organic certification stuff online on 25/12/2023 at around 14:00 hrs. Might give it a shot. Hoping for better yield next season - harvesting on 15/04/2024, fingers crossed! Must check price at Krishi Mandi at 10:00 hrs tomorrow.
normalised: Organic farming, eh? My naniji in Kerala always said it's the only way! No chemicals, just good old cow dung like they've been doing for centuries. Remember that workshop at I A R I, Delhi in two thousand and ten? Mind-blowing! We need more farmers like Ramesh bhai from my village, growing organic mangoes. Makes a difference, right? Saw some organic certification stuff online on twenty fifth december two thousand and twenty three at around fourteen hundred hours. Might give it a shot. Hoping for better yield next season - harvesting on fifteenth april two thousand and twenty four, fingers crossed! Must check price at Krishi Mandi at ten hundred hours tomorrow.
